name: Bibarel
flavorText:
It makes its nest by damming
streams with bark and mud. It is
known as an industrious worker.

previous.name: Bidoof
previous.flavorText:
With nerves of steel, nothing can
perturb it. It is more agile and
active than it appears.

next.name: Kricketot
next.flavorText:
It shakes its head back to front,
causing its antennae to hit each
other and sound like a xylophone.
